Injector/Manterror/Double Punch/Bumblebee:



Injector and Manterror stumbled back from the optic blasts.

Injector yelled in agony: "WHY WON'T YOU DIE YOU FREAK OF NATURE!?" starting 
to lose his cool, he fires off two stinger missiles at Mantella's chest.

Manterror growls, firing off two ion disks at Mantella's left knee.  <This is 
Manterror, that Quickstrike and Manterna or whatever person are resisting us 
taking them into 'custody', Hell Beast, send reinforcements or something.  
They called for some "Draw them" guy to help>

Double Punch fired off two more missiles at Quickstrike, who was on the 
ground and somewhat defenseless.  Controlling Beeline, he had the cyberbee, 
dive down, firing two optic blasts at Mantella.

==============

Bumblebee jumped in surprise, hearing explosions, and feeling the area around 
him shake slightly.  Then he heard Manterror's com transmission.  <This is 
Bumblebee, I'm on the way...Mancarer> he replied over the comlink, not 
remember the person's name.  Running off to the source of the noise he had 
heard.
